main event: One object observed falling from the sky, described as round with a tail, during a sighting on 14 April 1957.
interesting points: The object was the size of a quarter, It was white with an orange tail that was three times longer than the body, The observation lasted for 5 seconds, The sighting was reported by civilians, The conclusion suggested it might be a meteor of larger than normal size.
sighted object: one round object with a tail
witness description: Civilians including a housewife and another individual.
